Package net.royalur.agent

Class RandomAgent<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.agent.Agent<P,​S,​R>
      • net.royalur.agent.RandomAgent<P,​S,​R>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of pieces that this agent can interact with.
    S - The type of player state that this agent can interact with.
    R - The type of rolls that may be made by this agent.
    public class RandomAgent<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
extends Agent<P,​S,​R>
    An agent that makes random moves in games. This is not thread-safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ID
      The unique identifier of the random agent.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RandomAgent()
      Instantiates a random agent using a default source of randomness.
      RandomAgent​(java.util.Random random)
      Instantiates a random agent that uses random as its source of randomness.
